CONTENTS.P: Project name: Poltava Trolleybus Project
Country: Ukraine
Business sector: Municipal and Environmental Infrastructure
Project ID: 50055
Funding source: EBRD
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: General procurement notice
Issue date: 25.4.2018
Closing date: 25.4.2019

The Municipal Enterprise “Poltavaelectroavtotrans” of Poltava City Council (“the Company”), a municipal public transport operator, and the management of the City of Poltava have applied for loan financing from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (“the Bank”) to finance the renewal of Poltava’s trolleybuses fleet and modernisation of selected infrastructure. The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 10 000 000 EUR equivalent, will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services using the proceeds of the loan:
— Low-floor 12m trolleybuses,
— Trolleybus diagnostic and maintenance equipment (to be confirmed),
— Modernisation of traction substations (to be confirmed).
Tendering for the above contracts is expected to begin in the Q2 of 2018.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of the loan from the EBRD will be subject to the EBRD Procurement Policies and Rules (Rev. November 2017 – http://www.ebrd.com/work-with-us/procurement/policies-and-rules.html) and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the EBRD loans will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, of for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:
